description: One look at that mane of shiny black landing on his shoulders and it was easy to see where 20 year old's Samson's name came from but we didn't guess immediately were about to add something brand new to the global spanning collection of horny breeder boys...our very first Hawai'an.His skin is the color of a mocha latte, his eyes kohl black with the cutest, smallest little brown nips we've ever seen. Naturally hairless, save a single line of soft but dark trail that leads your eye into the biggest surprise of them all, smuggled inside those light blue boxers is an 8? tiki torch with a fact shiny knob and two low handing nuts in a sack as smooth as silk.  He tosses his head back as reaches deep inside and his eyes glaze over as he goes into an almost Zen-like trance as he finally hauls out that massive meat, the leaking head emerging from the thick folds like a hungry bear after a long winter's nap. Samson readily admits he's an ass man and, pardon the pun, what's good for the goose is good for his gander and he oils up his own smooth, white cheeks and proceeds to roll over and hump his own fist like a man just released from prison! He finally rolls over and lets a load rip that goes so high in the air, most of it lands invisible on the white ball behind him save one good juicy splat that lands back on the sexy tanned stomach.  Aloha never looked so good!!!
title: Hawaii Eight-O, Scene #02
